AU Convocation Hall
A Technical Event
Are you interested in latest Technologies and want to gain knowledge from the Techies? Then you are at a right place. Miracle being a Diamond sponsor for Digital Summit 2016 introduces a 3 day session at the event to walk you through the digital world with technical talks, innovative learning and live demos by multiple skilful speakers from various reputed organisations like Microsoft, IBM and Oracle.
This event will cover different technologies like IBM Bluemix, Microsoft Azure, Watson and Oracle's Cloud. Come and join us at Digital Summit '16 as we rove you through the next wave of technology on building an innovative and life-changing applications. Our experts will deliver keynote sessions on DevOps and Cloud technologies that makes your technical and development skills honed.

IBM Innovation Summit
Miracle and IBM bring to you a full day of innovation, learning and live demos with multiple reputed speakers. The IBM Innovation summit will cover various IBM technologies including IBM Bluemix, Watson and Node JS.

Shortly About Us!!
Miracle Software Systems, Inc., is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan with Global Delivery Centers in US, Canada and India. With over 20 years of industry experience, Miracle and its team of 2000 employees has been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers globally to achieve their business goals through technology.
Miracle's presence spans across 5 continents and expertise spans over Application Development and Management, Cloud Infrastructure and Applications, Hybrid Integration, ERP Development and Support, and Information Management. Our teams are dedicated to help you achieve goals and reduce costs through the use of technology.
